ygData.subject: Re: BlackFortress
ygData.msgSnippet: Night Shift transforms and watches the visual of Tucson Prime.  He was ecstatic about the change, yet he couldn t quite express that joy in front of Hydras,

Night Shift transforms and watches the visual of Tucson Prime.  He was ecst=
atic about the change, yet he couldn't quite express that joy in front of H=
ydras, Cyclonus, Scorponok, or Rodimus, in fear of exposing his true factio=
n.  Instead he makes a rather angry scowl.

"Slag!  Son of a Glitch! How'd =
he do that?!  I swear I kicked his aft from here ta the next galaxy, I don'=
t get it!  Look, I dunno how he did that, and when he did it, but he just s=
natched up the power from Prime's matrix!  Should've expected it though, se=
en' he's actually related ta the bot.  Okay, so what I got ta tell ya is I =
think he's plann'n an all out assault on you guys, like tryn' ta take this =
place for the Maximals and Autobots.  Wants ta level the fortress ta the gr=
ound.  What I think we gotta do is beat 'em at his own game.  And he knows =
we're gonna try'n get at the Ark, and if we go there, we're done for.  See?=
 It's not easy gettn' around the guy because he ain't your average scrap he=
ap.  He don't think like an average Autobot.  So, if I were you guys, that =
shell program you got gon' on, I think ya better have a bot make a backup o=
f that'n hold onto it.  Because he's gonna try'n blow this place sky high, =
and everything with it.  And as far as I know he'll be barrelln' in here wi=
th the rest of his posse any time now."

Of course he was telling them a co=
mplete lie, hoping they'd buy it.  His tone shows no indication of telling =
a fib.  Inside he was hoping that his idea mixed with Tucson's would take h=
old.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> =
wrote:
>
> > "Speak"said the male to Cyclonus
> 
> Next to Hydras a small v=
iew screen came to life and began to show a
> short clip of a large truck l=
ike vehicle that was leaving the Ark,
> bearing a distinctive likeness to O=
ptimus Prime, almost like a cross
> between his Earthen mode and his origin=
al cybertronian mode. There was
> the cab front and the trailer on back, th=
e trailer sporting two large
> and fearsome looking missiles. The truck loo=
ked powerful enough and
> regugged enough to roll over the most inhospitabl=
e terrain without
> slowing. It was currently moving at a sedate 55 mph.
> =

> "From the reading I am getting that is . . . or was . . . Tuscon."
> Cyc=
lonus paused to let the import of his next words to sink in, "I
> believe t=
hey have found a way to utilize the Matrix."
